website_summaries.verdict: A superior product that can cut through tough materials like leather with no problem. Excellent for the medical field and other applications.

customer_reviews.title: Thebomb.com
customer_reviews.text: The color looks more fuscia to me in the picture but is actually a really cute hot pink! These scissors cut through everything! I love them and the carabiner is just what this nurse needs since I bought these to replace the other pair I lost! Now they are easy to keep up with. The handle is a nice smooth sturdy plastic. This was definitely money well spent and I plan to buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: mulatto goddess

customer_reviews.title: Nag, nag, nag.
customer_reviews.text: These shears are the best. They open and close, and when you need to cut something well just close them and the act like shears and cut. And when you just want them to hang around they have a handy clip. Not just any clip but a fast clip. Half the time I don't even unclip them to open them. I just tilt them on my loop and cut loose just like the old quickdraws from cowboy days. Just don't forget to open them because you know you'll be half cocked. Truly amazing. The only downside is the multiple annoying emails I've gotten to get me to write a review. Even so 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Weaselbroom

customer_reviews.title: The clip makes it easy to find
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is my 4th pair of shears I’ve bought, but I love the clip. I usually have to ramble through my pocket with my millions of other items to find my shears. But clipping them to the ring of my scrubs makes it easy to get to and keep up with.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: These are by far a superior product, for years i have been using expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: Due to medical conditions i use shears to cut tape,gauze and adhesive products.These are by far a superior product,for years i have been using expensive and fancy looking shears that cost much more than EMT Trauma Shears with Carabiner.These cut twice as good as my high grade medical shears.That being said these shears are a high end product at a very reasonable cost.They fit my hand and are comfortable to use.At my older age few things excite me but these EMT SHEARS do.Please give these a try.Keith
customer_reviews.author: keith wood

customer_reviews.title: The Carabiner EMT Trauma Shears are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: The shears are comfortable to hold, stay closed when not in use, and easily cut surgical dressings, paper, cardboard, plastic, and virtually anything else I’ve tried them on. The blades are sharp and cut whatever I have needed to cut. The spring in the carabiner is strong enough to keep the carabiner closed, and so far I haven’t had a problem with it. Too, the shears arrived 2 days after it was ordered. I am very happy with this tool and am thinking of ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Schulsinger

customer_reviews.title: Thought they were great
customer_reviews.text: I received my sheers and thought they were great. I have a nurse change a bandage every day and she thought they were great the first day, they were opening a little loose. Second day she was cutting off the gauze and the shears split in half, obviously the. Piece which holds the the shears together wasn’t pie in right. I will let you know how there customer service resolves this issue. AFTER CONTACTING THE COMPANYY THEY SENT A NEW SET OUT THE NEXT DAY,,,,, THATS CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!! They definitely deserve 5 stars !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: These shears are great. Sliced through a patients heavy wet tshirt this afternoon with no problem at all. Nice and crisp action unlike most of those cheap disposable shears that kinda rattle around when you use them. Mine arrived with a slight bend in the carabineer spring (I think it was due to shipping damage) and wouldn't close properly and even though I was able to fix it, the GM John kindly sent me a replacement pair anyways. Awesome customer service. That's how it should be done. Thanks John.
customer_reviews.author: michael l.

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective for Multiple Purposes & Easy to Secure
customer_reviews.text: I love these scissors because they are easy to secure onto a stethoscope or loop on your uniform. That prevents it from falling out of your pocket. I also like the unique characteristics because NO ONE else has this fancy type of scissors & it's easy to notice who has them. I have lost multiple pairs of scissors/Trauma Shears because people forget to return them and many people have look alikes. I try to get more colorful styles like bright colors (pink, orange, light green) or unique patterns (e.g. leopard) but lost too many pairs. It's frustrating when you work in a busy ED that's also a Trauma Center, Stroke Center, and CP Center. Thank-you!
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyKindle

customer_reviews.title: Great sheers
customer_reviews.text: We are using these for utility cutters, we have an event company and need to have heavy duty cutters that will work on anything from fabric to thin wire and these work great. The serrations are cut well and sharp so they hold the piece to be cut while cutting. The size is great they fit in a pocket or with the carabiner they can clip to your belt or harness. They are light weight so you forget they are there until you need them. I am going to buy several more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive shears that cut VERY well.
customer_reviews.text: I don't work in the medical field. I bought these shears for a variety of utility applications around my home. Frankly I'm not dazzled by the overall look of this product and as other reviewers have stated, these shears are a bit stiff. (Probably a necessity on an inexpensive product with a non adjustable rivet). The real strength of this tool is in its cutting ability. I've cut THICK cardboard, leather and stout paracord without issue and this tool literally destroys a variety of stubborn packaging materials. If you're in the market for inexpensive shears that cut VERY well, this may be the product for you. If needed, I would definitely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love them so much I bought three!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. I bought the first pair to use during nursing school clinicals because the nurses never seemed to have scissors on them. I bought the second pair when my dog got sick and needed a lot of bandage changes. Bought this third pair because I misplaced the first pair ( I think I left them in a patient's room- explains why nurses never seem to have scissors on them). My first two pairs are/were black, but I bought red this time, hoping I don't leave them lying around this time. But if I do, I'll be back; these are great scissors!!
customer_reviews.author: rescue mom

customer_reviews.title: The clip will change your life!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I'm a surgical resident & i find a reason to use these just about everyday & there's not much that these won't cut through. My favorite part though is the clip that i use to keep it hanging on my stethoscope. I've had other shears, that were just as good, but i unfortunately misplaced them. With these i never have to worry about losing them. They're bright pink, and adorable and super efficient & handy. Easy to clean also. After about 6 months they're a bit dull, so I'm ordered a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Prim

customer_reviews.title: Not a toy
customer_reviews.text: Quality is superior to all the rest. Finger holes big enough for my husband but not to big for me. Carabiner is sturdy and easy to operate to get to quickly, one handed. I use to have to cut through a layer or two of rolled gauze, now I just cut through the entire bandage at once. These are a serious tool, not a toy
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L. Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Durable, worth the money, would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so that I wouldn't have to spend a fortune on trauma shears and I wouldn't trade these in the world. I work in the ED so I bought a black and pink pair. The hold up to whatever I have to cut and my coworkers want to use my shears most of the time over their own. They are sharp, fit my hand well, and I am able to clip them to my pants. And the company guaranteed to fix them whenever I need it, which I haven't needed yet. Wod reccomend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a visiting nurse
customer_reviews.text: OUr visiting nurse was always searching for her shears. Seeing this on amazon, it looked like a perfect solution. I liked them so much I bought 2, one for a backup. She loved them. she can now clip them on her bag and instantly verify she has her shears when she leaves. the Pink handle makes them easy to see. And the quality is superior to shears costing 2x. All and all, awesome product. May have to buy a couple of sets for myself.... hopefully not in how pink :)
customer_reviews.author: Mike Graupner

customer_reviews.title: Best Bandage/Medical Shears I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Using this for bandage changes for my injured father at home. I had already broken my standard pair I purchased when I first became a RN. These are lightweight, easy-to-use, sharp, and very durable. Best purchase I've made of medical equipment in years. Will recommend to all my coworkers to check these shears out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable and good customer representation!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a present so I can't be sure how well they work. I can say that before I ever received the shears, I received an email from the company guaranteeing that if for any reason I was dissatisfied with them the company would take care of them. They explained exactly how the shears were to be used and how to take care of them and to contact if I had any problem whatsoever. I feel sure this will prove to be a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Pulliam

customer_reviews.title: Cut through anything g
customer_reviews.text: I am a Trauma NP and lead or attend lots of Trauma Alerts in the ED. I always have these in my pocket, and they haven’t failed me yet. I frequently pull them out when the ED’s Trauma shears can’t get the job done. The handle is hot pink, brighter than I expected, but I like that they stand out and are easy to identify as mine because people often borrow them out of my back pocket when we’re working on a patient.
customer_reviews.author: mother22

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shears!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these shears! I work in the ER and I was so sick of constantly buying new shears as mine would always fall out of my pocket and be lost forever. These are great because you can clip them onto a belt loop or badge loop if your scrubs have them. They are worth the price to just buy one pair you aren't going to lose. They are also fantastic quality and will cut through ANYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: SuzeTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Best/sharpest sheers !!
customer_reviews.text: Others I work with buy the expensive $100 sheers but these are sometimes better and sharper than theirs !!! Cant complain especially with the price! I work in an Emergency Dept. And often have to cut clothes off and these sheers cut with perfect ease !
customer_reviews.author: Debe Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Recommend item, sturdy,and sharp would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: As described, I have similar scissors for fishing and I have cut pennies from other countries with them and they have capabilities to do so...dulled blades, imagine that. These are for the intended purposes and I have been impressed with the sharpness and quality of my new scissors for medical purposes. Recommend item, sturdy, improvements in angles and design promising and dependable and versatile. I think I'm going to have these for a good amount of time unless lost or something I don't want as much as someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: great pair of shears
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting regular shears but I ended up with Carabiner shares they're actually way better than I thought they would be I appreciate the fact I can clip them on and retain them because I'm a scaffold Builder and these hang onto my body a lot better than if I were putting them in like whole bag give them two thumbs up recommended to any scaffold Builder cutting netting and not able to use a regular utility knife on the job
customer_reviews.author: leslie wood

customer_reviews.title: Superior cutting ability
customer_reviews.text: Makes quick and painless work of cutting-off heavy (gauze/tape) layers of a lower leg bandage. Smaller scissor was tried but caused pain with slow cutting. Used for about 2 weeks, this Bandage Scissors is still sharp and tight. Still, many cuts to go. I would buy these again, even for smaller bandaged areas.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Fine for a first aid kit.
customer_reviews.text: These are simply inexpensive Taiwan stainless steel bandage shears. They have a metal clip on the side, not a true carabiner. That means that you can clip them on something while working, if you wish. They will work just fine for my first aid kit, but they are probably too light duty for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Carlucci

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but jaws too thick/wide for some applications
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually used these as the jaws are too big for what I intended, which is bandaging for my dog. They arrived when I was re-bandaging her foot daily but the bottom jaw of the blade is just too wide to slip between her leg and the wrapping. However, they seem to be high quality and I'm sure they cut very well and will be great for other situations. In the meantime I'm going to try a 4" shears to compliment them
customer_reviews.author: Dean S

customer_reviews.title: DISCLAIMER - I AM NOT AN EMT
customer_reviews.text: Nor do I provide any service in which to use this on a regular basis. That being said. They are perfect for me. I use them to cut rope, so far the largest I have cut with it has been 1/2-inch braided cotton chord, which it did with ease. I love the carabiner feature, makes it easy to hang on myself or something close by just in case I need to use it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Harri McNuggs

customer_reviews.title: Good shears for a RN
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Med/Surg nurse so I purchased these to use on the unit. They are helpful with opening IV packaging, tape, and just random things during my shift. They are a good size, and seem to be very well made. They have a nice feel to them, The carabiner feature is cool, though I don’t really use it. I attach them to a retractable badge holder and clip them to my scrub pants for easy access
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_S

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are an absolute must have! They are very durable and cut so nicely. I have had no issues cutting through an assortment of materials that often would have been a challenge with other scissors.. these on the other hand cut through even the toughest of fabrics, casting materials, etc with ease. Not only are the scissors amazing, but the customer service is phenomenal! They truly care about the quality of their product and will ensure that you receive a quality pair of sheers and that you are absolutely satisfied. What’s not to love? Go ahead and order them, you will not be disappointed! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: BIG AND STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used them yet but i can say they’re heavy duty made. I don’t see them going dull quickly. Only down fall FOR ME is they’re a little big for my pockets. I definitely need to attach a clip of some sort to carry then safely and avoid holes in my pockets. Love the lifetime warentee they provide. Shows how well they back up their product.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce S.

customer_reviews.title: Large Scissors
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are larger than I expected. I initially purchased them for my clinical rotations but due to COVID 19, I haven't had the chance to put them to proper use. If you have smaller hands these will be a little hard on your hands when cutting. Overall they are very sturdy, the clip is a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: CharallJ

customer_reviews.title: Should I oil the pivot points?
customer_reviews.text: Based on the many good reviews this product has received, I decided to buy them. They feel sturdy and strong, yet not too heavy to carry in a pocket. The only thing that bothers me a little is that they are hard to open and close. Not sure if that's normal or if I got a defective scissors. It still gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Asyn

customer_reviews.title: Blades close in tough way.
customer_reviews.text: My carabiners -Have a Snappy carabiner -Shears stay closed, even with a moderate shake -They fit your hand as you like. Sadly they are as the caution message that I received about how the blades close. When they close, they are a bit tough and don’t feel very smooth. You don’t want to return it because I need to use it ASAP but hopefully with more use, the blades will be more smooth when they close.
customer_reviews.author: Marita Ye

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept... too tight to cut quickly, difficult for small hands.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part these shears are great. Great concept, great that they don't open and close bouncing around when hooked to your belt loop, etc. However for someone with smaller hands they are difficult to open and close to cut quickly because they are almost TOO tight. Maybe they will loosen up over time and get easier but first impression is a little lackluster.
customer_reviews.author: Halo

customer_reviews.title: Heady duty
customer_reviews.text: If you’re in the market for shears these are the best! I’ve had different shears before but these take the cake! These are heavy duty and good quality and I love that they have the hook. My only complaint is they’re on the bigger size and are hard to fit in my pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Bren M.

customer_reviews.title: The best bandage scissors I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.text: My coworkers teased me when I bought these scissors, because they are so large...until they borrowed them and saw how well they work! They are sharp enough to cut easily through several layers of bandages and really fit my hand well. They have a good rounded bottom edge to protect patient skin.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Cruze

customer_reviews.title: Handy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Love the carabiner feature to have scissors available exactly when I need them. Bought these for my horse first aid kit and they did not disappoint. They can cut through thick cotton/tape/vetwrap on a fidgety horse without any trouble at all and no injury to the horse.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: They don't last.
customer_reviews.text: They were amazing for about a yr. now they won't even cut tshirt fabric anymore. When I first bought them I was surprised by the shear size (see what I did there!) of them. They are a bit large. (I wish they would offer them in a 5in.)I love the carabiner attachment but am so disappointed with how long they long they lasted. If they sold a 5 in, I would try them one more time.. they are just too big for an L&D nurse to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Decent pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the light weight things we do. After I bought this pair my co-worker pulled out his new pair that is heavier duty and is like a leather man tool. Obviously a more expensive pair. That being said-ISO like this pair for regular jobs, like the clip on it. Light weight to carry in your pocket. Have not cut pennies with it-5)36 feel lighter than my first pairs from the 1980s. But they work fine for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: andrea hetzler

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that they are stainless
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that they are stainless. I also love the carabiner incorporated into the handle. I will be using it while scuba diving and it makes it easy get to. It is arguably much safer to use than a dive knife (although there is a place for a knife depending on your dive location). I will see how it holds up after a few dives and see if it still warrants 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jel Orian

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality Surgical Steel! Lifetime Warranty on the Patented Carabiner Mechanism!
customer_reviews.text: CarabinerShearsTM are a made of superior quality surgical steel. They’re built to last, and give you years of dependable service. These are not the cheap disposable shears you’ll find around the Emergency room. So choose a color you like, you’re going to have them for a long time! CarabinerShearsTM come with a lifetime warranty on the Patented* Carabiner mechanism. If the CarabinerShearsTM mechanism fails due to manufacturer defect, we’ll replace the shears. That simple.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Gage

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Clumsy and awkward. curse it every time I try to use it. So glad it is in the trash now.
customer_reviews.author: freq_buyer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have used these shears extensively for casts and splints in the last two weeks that I have owned them and I have generally been impressed. I will revise the review if there is any change in performance that suggests the durability is not as advertised but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Danger

customer_reviews.title: Great shears!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the so much I bought a second pair, I particularly like the clip on the handle for easy hooking to a belt loop etc... I like these a lot well made and work as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Kevlnda

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Took my old "cheap" scissors and replaced them with these. I can quick attach them to my belt after cutting clothing and then they are ready to cut another piece of dressing. Cool
customer_reviews.author: Captain PaulTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nursing scissors
customer_reviews.text: I’m a wound nurse and these are completely safe and reliable. Have been using for a couple of months with no noticeable wear. Comfortable to hold and the color makes sure you don’t forget them in a room.
customer_reviews.author: Canned fish

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised!
customer_reviews.text: These shears are everything I expected them to be! They were purchased as a gift for my girlfriend who's a nurse and she absolutely loves them! She's pleased with everything from the color and size to the way they cut. The price was well below what I'd expect to pay elsewhere and with a lifetime guarantee, comes the assurance of a strong dependable product that is sure to be used for a very long time to come!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bouch

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and good grips for big hands.
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp. I have large hands and the finger grips are actually comfortable even when cutting something really tough like seatbelts. The caribener snaps closed and stays closed.
customer_reviews.author: SquidLips

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with the Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Shears work extremely well, very sharp and easy to use. I don't currently have a need for the Carabiner attachment but can image how handy it would be if I carried the Shears. Good price, completely satisfied with the Carabiner shears.
customer_reviews.author: JCRIA

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I used the shears for two months in the trauma bay of an emergency department. They cut through clothes without any issues. They are a little too big to stay comfortably in the scrub pocket when I sit down. ( So basically I sit and they tend to slide out of my pocket. They definitely stayed in place while I was standing though which is probs the more important). The bright pink color definitely helped me keep my shears straight from everyone else's.
customer_reviews.author: elise

customer_reviews.title: Good but not compact
customer_reviews.text: Im a nurse and like to have a pair of scissors on me when I’m working. I don’t like the idea of having scissors floating around in one of my pockets when I could be using the pocket for something else. The clip works just fine and the scissors cut just fine. I just wish they were offered in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn N.

customer_reviews.title: Great, sharp scissors
customer_reviews.text: Great, sharp scissors, with a convenient carabiner clip. I work as a nurse in a busy care center where I am often times creating custom made bandages and dressings for wounds of all sizes. In my work place it can be hard to come by a good pair of scissors, due to staff loosing them or destroying the scissors over time. Taking matters into my own hands I came across these scissors while shopping on Amazon. They work perfectly, and it is helpful to be able to clip them to a belt loop or the handle of my medical bag. My coworkers have already been asking to borrow my scissors! Very good investment. Would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I was an ER nurse for years and now I am an ICU nurse and I cant tell you how much these come in handy! Especially when u are in the middle of a dressing change and forgot the dang scissors!
customer_reviews.author: Maylen

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to have in my equipment bag to cut wrist tape and pad tape. I like the safety tip (no holes in my bag). And they are light weight, good sized.
customer_reviews.author: John Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: RUST easily
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these scissors and put them right into my stethoscope case when I received them. Never used and bought for nursing school this August. Checked back and they’re already rusted after only sitting in my room. Pretty disappointing and will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Candy Remington

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I returned the first one and they sent me a second one that was just as stuck as the first. Too hard and stuck to use quickly and with one hand
customer_reviews.author: Debbie morris Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shears
customer_reviews.text: I use my shears daily for many things. The shears seem sturdy and well made and I like that it has a Lifetime Guarantee on them. I purchased the red ones and they are a true red. I like the nice plastic case they came in, so when I am not using them they can be slipped right into the case. I would recommend these shears to all family and friends to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzin Bee ReviewsTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: For my son
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these scissors for my son, who is in his junior year of college, with a major in Athletic Training. He is currently doing his clinical, hands on experience in actual game settings. In talking with him almost nightly he has said that the scissors are working well and very dependable. He is pleased with the item and with the company and he, I, is looking forward in making future purchases as he continues in his career. Thank you, Anthony' s Dad
customer_reviews.author: Anthony's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Good shears, useful feature.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased so far. The quality of the shears is good and they have survived accidental laundering without issue. These are not a gimmick, but rather they are good shears with a good feature that prevents loss and keeps them vertical in your scrub pocket. The seller is very interested in making sure you are happy with your shears. Will be buying again either as gifts or when these are used up.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Very clever idea
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my niece who was just accepted to nursing school. As an RN myself for 34 years there have been many times in my past when these would have come in very handy!! They seem to be well made but it will be a while before she will start using them.
customer_reviews.author: jsattrn

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Scissors
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to cut paracord but they work for just about anything. Stainless Steel and the carabiner works perfectly for taking fishing to cut braid. May have to get a 2nd pair so I keep one set with my paracord tools.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Crump

customer_reviews.title: WOULD 100% RECOMMEND (especially if you work in healthcare!)
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these! I am soooo impressed by their quality! They’re large, but they still fit into my hand. They’re my favorite color - bright print. They have a handy dandy carabiner on the side so that carrying them in scrubs is soooo much easier. They are autoclavable, surgical steel, and have a lifetime warranty. The carabiner is sturdy, they’re extremely sharp, and overall they’re just one of the greatest tools I’ve found to make my life easier in the clinical setting!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stoker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pair of shears that remain sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shears! They are sharp and have stayed sharp..no comparison to the little cheap bandage shears that only last a few weeks and the blades loosen up. My only issue is that I am a small person and the shears are rather large but I still love them! I'll be ordering more for my other nurse mates who have borrowed them and want a pair for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Houghtaling

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the ad. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shears. The carabiner is perfect and snaps shut as it should. The color is an amazing bright pink! Super sharp, but stays closed so no accidental pokes or cuts. Comfortable to carry in my side pants pocket on my scrubs. Easy to clean and fits my hand so cutting is simple and quick. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very functional shears
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy durable and easy to use. I like the clasp so you can clip to scrubs so you don’t loose them on those crazy busy shifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and getting the job done!
customer_reviews.text: These shears are decent for the price and will definitely do the job. They cut tape, thick plastic, and other material without any issues. They are a little uncomfortable to use, in my opinion and feel kind of cheap BUT for a five-ten minute dressing change or simply cutting a piece of clothing, they are worth the buy. I work on a med-surg floor and am in nursing school, and these are great for your basic needs. I would recommend, but once these wear out, I probably won't purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Welch

customer_reviews.title: great shears for the price
customer_reviews.text: portability and easy access thanks to the carabiner I have used these in the emergency room setting for the last few weeks and still sharp and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Vicente White Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Very useful in SCUBA diving too. If you get caught in a net or line, do not use your knife use these scissors. Also good for splitting thin walled cast molds.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Leatham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scissors for a busy RN
customer_reviews.text: Perfect scissors for a busy RN. My scissors used to fall out of my pocket every time I'd go running down the hall...not anymore! I also like that my phone doesn't get scratched anymore by the scissors in my pocket. The carabiner is loose enough to latch/un-latch from your pants using 1 hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holding up so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar pair of shears which I used to clip onto a loop on my scrubs. The clip broke pretty quickly. The clip on this pair of shears seems much more robust and is holding up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!! The most durable reel badge I have found. You could feel how durable it is when you hold it. It is a little (tiny) bit heavy but not bad. Well made!
customer_reviews.author: Breana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and strong!
customer_reviews.text: These shears are the same ones I used as an ER RN They are powerful and never get dull I’m retired now but use them in business and multiple household tasks. Count on these when you need shears to count on!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at work comes to me to borrow my scissors. Love the hot pink color, I’m the only one one on the unit that has them.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Not really field shears
customer_reviews.text: The carabiner clip is strong enough to attach, but I was hoping for stronger, more durable field shears. Great for clinic or hospital use but I don't recommend it for fieldwork; The shears cut clean and easy and I think the cug
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and Cut fast.
customer_reviews.text: Trauma shears, for when you need to cut stuff and get it done fast. Like the pretty pink handles and the carabiner to attach to my scrub pocket. The only shears I’ll ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Surpassed my expectations! I have been changing bandages on my dog's leg every two days for the past 2 months and will likely have to do so for quite a while. Before I purchased these scissors, I was using my household utility scissors which are not nearly sharp enough and make me fearful that I will accidentally hurt or even cut her while removing the bandage. Theses scissors are a game changer! The angle of the scissors and their blunt tip allow me to cut the bandage off without fear of accidentally hurting her and the sharpness of the blades allow me to do so quickly.....which she is equally happy about, no doubt! I love these scissors!
customer_reviews.author: gayle a. gennette

customer_reviews.title: These get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several pairs of these scissors in different colors. All have worked perfectly and I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for this ER nurse!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my scissors. The clip allows me to have them readily accessible versus digging around in my pockets. This is critical in the ED.
customer_reviews.author: S. Whitmire

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Economical, and over all great great great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shears. I have had them for over a month or so and they are the best bang for your buck. I work in the ER and and when you work in a busy unit like mine you have to work fast and you want a shear that can do that and these do it. I have co workers who have those fancy expensive shears that can cut fine but not as sharp as these that can cut easily with one fell swoop. My advice invest in new scrubs and shoes. Everyone seems to borrow my shears over theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shears! And
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shears! And, with the very well, thought-out carabiner, which is incorporated, in da' handle, itself, you shouldn't "misplace" or "loose" said "awesome shears"!! And, the price is AFFORDABLE!!! Sincerely, Francisco Medina
customer_reviews.author: francisco medina

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The scissors are great for the price. I specifically like the clip. I do wish they were a little smaller to fit in my pocket but the size does make them sturdy. I will check to see if they make them in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: JessRae

customer_reviews.title: Nice but starting to rust
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these scissors when I received them about a month ago. The carabiner makes them really convenient to clip to my scrub top-no more fumbling in my pocket for them! Unfortunately they are beginning to show little rust spots
customer_reviews.author: Elena Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Great carabiner feature built in!
customer_reviews.text: The carabiner is a great usable feature for many. My peers were wanting to know where I got them from !
customer_reviews.author: Erin P

customer_reviews.title: A great tool to keep handy!
customer_reviews.text: The trauma shears have performed exceptionally. They cut through a rubber tounriquet with ease - allowing me to gain IV access and likely preventing hypovolemic shock. Basically, these shears saved my patient’s life.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Use these everyday in my job as a nurse and they come in handy all the time! The little clip is nice if I don’t have a pocket to slide them into! They cut through everything and don’t get stuck or jammed up when cutting thick materials, really have enjoyed these so far!
customer_reviews.author: tawny lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not durable...junk
customer_reviews.text: Didnt even last 2 months. I wouldnt waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Vicabby

customer_reviews.title: i consider this purchase an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: shears were purchased for my caregiver.she had been using regular scissors that had pointed blades when I saw the type being used by the visiting nurses and aides,i shoppef the internet and purchased the varabiner shears.when the nurse saw the shears,she praised them.i consider this purchase an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: William Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight EMT Shears
customer_reviews.text: Very light trauma shears, carabiner snaps shut and doesn’t come loose. Fits perfectly with protective gloves on.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: I don't go a day at work without them
customer_reviews.text: These shears are so great I ended up buying a second version just in case I lost them. My coworkers ask to borrow them on the regular and always remark about just how nice they are to hold & use. Whether it's boring light use or emergency "need this quick" use. They've never failed to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Goit a neon color so I can see them.  I would hate to lose these.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to see. I don't mind the bright colors. I wish more tools were neon bright so I do not forget them.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer reporter

customer_reviews.title: Great for rope enthusiasts too!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Perfect fit in the hand. The carabineer handle also fits well through eye bolts on hard points. I can't report on durability as I purchased recently, however it seems to be a sturdy piece of equipment designed to last.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cut amazing
customer_reviews.text: These shears are the best. Easy to use for good in any hands and work really good. My friend had an expensive shear and endearing up using mine cause his didn’t cut. They cut really good.
customer_reviews.author: Misly

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and good hand feel
customer_reviews.text: I have used it twice so far to remove patient' clothes and wound dressing. It is sharp, and it has a good hand feel.
customer_reviews.author: Yang

customer_reviews.title: Size Large
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected but that’s ok. Love the carabiner. Good sharp cut and easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: Goal Chaser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my job
customer_reviews.text: As a nurse who works in the OR I need strong and durable scissors to cut off anything! These scissors are just that! The best part is they are not as expensive as trauma shears and work pretty well! Built to last and not flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for a new nurse graduate and I'm so impressed with the quality and durability. She loves pink so not only is it the perfect color but the quality is awesome! I'm also very impressed with the company. They go out of their way to make sure you are happy with the product and that it stands the test of time! Five stars plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Clip
customer_reviews.text: Quite the useful tool to have on your person or part of a daily carry. I mainly have it clipped on my sports bag or inside my backpack. The clip has come in handy more than expected. The shears aren't the most comfortable to hold but work as trauma shears as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Truong

customer_reviews.title: A bit sharper but good
customer_reviews.text: It would be good if they were a bit sharper. Save for that I wasn't disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently sitting in an operating room as I type this. The shears are in my pocket and they do a great job. I’ve ordered multiple pairs. Not because they’ve worn out but because my co-workers borrow them and they suddenly disappear. A great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I loved these! I work in a trauma center and these shears were everything I needed.
customer_reviews.author: glad2day

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Great brand and great scissors. Cuts through pennies with ease. Would buy from seller in a heartbeat. I received an email even before I received item to verify if I had any issues, send it back immediately and they would replace. They seemed to care a lot about service.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tegeler

product_meta.title: EMT Trauma Shears with Carabiner - 7.5" Stainless Steel Bandage Scissors for Surgical, Medical & Nursing Purposes - Sharp Curved Scissor is Perfect for EMS, Doctors, Nurses, Cutting Bandages [Blue]
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue“Fast, safe and efficient EMT trauma shears make life easier for medical workers everywhere!” 

Cut Quickly and Efficiently 
These premium trauma shears are a unique, patented improvement on the ubiquitous disposable EMT shear. Clip them onto your waist, never lose them thanks to the built-in carabiner and cut anything from bandages to leather to seatbelts with ease. 

Made from Japanese Surgical Grade Stainless Steel 
The blades and rivets of these medical scissors are made from high quality Japanese surgical grade stainless steel, and each blade features precision milled serrations for fast and efficient cutting. The scissors measure 7.5 inches from tip to endmost point of the handle - the standard size for hospitals, operating rooms and ERs. 

Features Patented Carabiner for Easy Access 
Tired of losing shears from pockets or holsters? Our premium design features a patented, steel-reinforced carabiner that allows you to clip the shears directly onto your waistband. Keep them within reach at all times when you’re on the job! 

The Ideal Choice for EMT Workers, Doctors & Nurses 
We’re proud to say that many EMTs, nurses and others in the medical field have told us repeatedly how much they value our shears. The injection-molded handles are large and comfortable, and the carabiner is a welcome addition. These have been called by medical workers “The best trauma shear they’ve ever had!” 

Durable, Long-Lasting Construction 
Your shears are made with a high quality manufacturing process that creates a strong, professional and long-lasting tool. You’ll be sure to have these scissors for years to come, so pick a color you like! They come in Black, Blue, Red and Neon Pink.
feature_bullets: CUT FAST & SAFE EVERY TIME - Cut anything safely and efficiently with these sharp, professional grade medical scissors. With these premium shears on your belt you’ll make quick work of anything from bandage and tape to leather or seatbelt webbing.

SURGICAL STAINLESS STEEL SHEARS - These EMT trauma shears feature blades and rivets made from Japanese surgical grade stainless steel, with precision milled serrations along the blade. The scissor is 7.5 inches long, the standard size in most hospitals, operating rooms and ERs.

FEATURES PATENTED CARABINER - Your set of surgical scissors are equipped with a unique, steel-reinforced carabiner so they can easily clip onto your waist and be within reach at all times. That means no more losing trauma shears from a pocket or holster!

PERFECT FOR EMT WORKERS, DOCTORS & NURSES - We’re proud to say we’ve had incredible feedback from those working in the medical field who use our shears. The carabiner is convenient and the handles are smooth for easy cleaning and offer a large, comfortable opening for your hands. These scissors are also autoclavable at 290F/143C for hospital use.

DURABLE, LONG-LASTING CONSTRUCTION - Combine Japanese surgical grade stainless steel and injection-molded handles with a high quality manufacturing process and you have a set of shears that will stay sharp, always cut smoothly and last you reliably for years to come. Available colors are Black, Blue, Red and Neon Pink.
